Description: 2024 has been a whirlwind so far. Amidst a crazy busy semester, I squeezed in brief getaways to North Carolina, Stockholm, and London. Despite the rapid pace so far, I'm excited to take a breather and see what the rest of the year holds. Can't wait to see what else happens in 2024!

Last year felt like a blur. Immersed in my final undergrad semester, I witnessed an incredible showcase of my classmates' capstones. After backpacking in Europe, I moved to New York for my Master's. It has been one rollercoaster of a year!.

In 2022, work and assignments consumed my days, leaving gaps in my timeline as I recorded little. However, a summer internship revealed my passion for product and UX design, an exciting revelation shaping my future as a designer.

This timeline encapsulates moments of my life from 2022 to 2024. In two years, I saw the world come out of a global pandemic, earned my undergrad degree, moved to NYC and explored thirteen countries. As I expand this timeline, I eagerly anticipate what's to come.
